net.sf.jasperreports.crosstabs
Interface JRCrosstabParameter

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, JRCloneable, JRDatasetParameter, JRParameter, JRPropertiesHolder
All Known Implementing Classes:
JRBaseCrosstabParameter, JRDesignCrosstabParameter, JRFillCrosstabParameter
public interface JRCrosstabParameter
extends JRParameter, JRDatasetParameter

Crosstab parameters interface.

Crosstab parameters are used to use external values inside a crosstab.

A parameter consists of a name and a value expression. The values can also be set by using a Map object with name/value mappings.

Version:
$Id: JRCrosstabParameter.java 4595 2011-09-08 15:55:10Z teodord $
Author:
Lucian Chirita (lucianc@users.sourceforge.net)
See Also:
JRCrosstab.getParameters(), JRCrosstab.getParametersMapExpression()
